Title: Pilot
Plot: After missing and presumed dead for eight years, Marine Sergeant Nicholas Brody is rescued in Iraq, and returns home to his family. But CIA agent Carrie Mathison suspects he might have been turned by his terrorist captors, and believes he could be part of a plan to attack America.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Writer: Howard Gordon, Alex Gansa, Gideon Raff
GuestStars: Jamey Sheridan, Navid Negahban, David Marciano, Maury Sterling, Nestor Serrano, Afton Williamson, Israel Balderas
